name: Dokimon - [8bit] Pokemonesque OST; 20+ songs
description:
[8bit] Pokemonesque OST; 20+ songs

This asset pack offers:

  • 20+ Original songs intended for use in video games
  • This OST is inspired by Pokémon games and has a classic 8bit aesthetic
  • Additionally, there is a matching Piano version of this OST available
Made for MonMae

This asset pack has been made to work together with MonMae, however you are free to use them however you like! If you'd like to learn more about MonMae, or see these assets in use, please check out our MonMae YouTube Tutorial Series!

- License Information -

You Can:

Edit and use these assets in any engine to create non-commercials games

You Cannot:

Share or Sell these assets, nor derivations or fan arts of them (regardless of intent), nor use them in commercial products. Assets listed below include commercial licenses~

You Must:

Credit us like so: (c) Yanako RPGs LLC - @yanako_rpgs
